name: Pua
description:
En esta aventura seguiremos a Pua, una alquimista aventurera y arrojada que busca los secretos del bosque de la noche eterna.

¿Conseguirá su objetivo o será una de las mil y un víctimas del bosque oscuro y tenebroso?

Pua es una aventura point and click, solo se necesita un mouse para jugar :)

This is an adventure where we follow Pua, an alchemist and an adventurer who seeks the secrets of the forest of never-ending night.

Will she made it through the forest? Or will she succumb to the monsters and apparitions of the forest?

Pua is a point and click adventure, you only need a mouse to play :)

Twitter: @Pua_Video_Game

Intagram: https://instagram.com/pua.game?utm_medium=copy_link
